speaker

portraits
msg
Everyone, we have to prepare one thing before we leave.
各位，在我们出发前有一件事情需要提前准备。
みんな、出発する前に準備しなきゃいけないことがあるの。
다들, 출발하기 전에 준비해야 할 게 있어.
Folks, there is one thing we need to prepare in advance before we leave.
Guys, there are some things we need to prepare before we leave.
msg
To find the Herrscher core more effectively, we need to locate the direction, so we can save more time.
为了有效地寻找长空市中的律者核心，我们需要先定位律者核心的大致方位，这样就可以节省很多时间。
長空市にある律者コアを効率的に探し出すためにも、まずはその大まかな方位を検出する必要があるの。そうすれば、時間も節約できて探索の短縮につながるわ。
장공시에 있는 율자 코어를 효율적으로 찾아내기 위해서도, 먼저 그 대략적인 방위를 검출할 필요가 있어. 그러면 시간도 절약되고 탐색 시간을 단축시킬 수 있거든.
In order to effectively find the Ruler's Core in Long Sky City, we need to locate the general location of the Ruler's Core first, which will save a lot of time.
In order to efficiently locate the Ruler's Core in the Long Sky City, we first need to detect its general orientation. That way we can save time and shorten the search.
portraits
msg

I have this device to investigate the radiation field of Honkai energy around here, before the dead plague is re-activated it can be hardly found because of the high level of Honkai energy, but now the situation is different.
我现在手上的这个仪器可以探测附近崩坏能的辐射场，在死斑激活之前由于崩坏能浓度过高所以几乎无法定位出它的方位，但是在崩坏能衰退的现在情况就不同了。
私が持っているこの機械は、どこから崩壊エネルギーが放射されているのか探知できるものよ。死斑が復活する前は、どこも崩壊エネルギー濃度が高いせいで方位を確定できなかったけど、弱まった今なら違うわ。
내가 가진 이 기계는 붕괴 에너지가 방사되고 있는 출처를 탐지할 수 있는 거야. 사문이 부활하기 전에는 어디나 붕괴 에너지 농도가 높아서 방위를 확정하지 못했지만, 약해진 지금은 달라.

The instrument I have now can detect the radiation field of the nearby avalanche energy. Before the activation of the dead spot, the concentration of avalanche energy is too high so it is almost impossible to locate its position, but the situation is different now that the avalanche energy is declining.

I have this machine that can detect where the decay energy is radiating from. Before the resurrection of the dead spots, it was impossible to determine the direction due to the high concentration of decay energy everywhere, but now that it has weakened, it is different.
msg
When Honkai energy declines the variant of radiation field is more obvious, many areas are able to be detected as well, this is the best opportunity.
衰退时产生的能级偏差不仅使得辐射场的变量更加的明显，同时也让很多原本因为浓度过高而无法探测的区域达到了检测值，这是一个绝佳的时机。
崩壊エネルギーが弱まると、値の変動がよりわかりやすくなるだけじゃなく、濃度が高いせいで検出できなかったエリアも検出可能になるの。つまり、絶好のチャンスってわけ。
붕괴 에너지가 약해지면 값의 변동이 더욱 뚜렷해질 뿐만 아니라, 농도가 높아서 검출하지 못했던 지역도 검출 가능해져. 즉, 절호의 기회라는 거지.

The energy level deviation created during the recession not only makes the variables of the radiation field more visible, but also allows many areas that would otherwise be undetectable due to high concentrations to reach detection values, which is an excellent time to do so.

Not only does the weakening of the decay energy make fluctuations in the values more obvious, but it also makes it possible to detect areas that were undetectable due to high concentrations. In other words, it is a great opportunity.
msg
If what we want to find is really in Nagazora, then its Honkai energy wave will influence the radiation fields around it…as long as we observe the change of radiation fields, we can find it.
我们要找的东西如果真的在长空市内的话，那么它所释放的崩坏能辐射波就一定会影响到周围的场…只要通过观测辐射场的变化，就能定位出它所在的位置范围了。
私たちの探し物が本当に長空市にあるなら、その崩壊エネルギーは周りに影響を与えているはず……この変化を観測することで、その大まかな場所を割り出すの。
우리가 찾는 물건이 정말 장공시에 있다면, 그 붕괴 에너지는 주변에 영향을 미치고 있을 거야... 이 변화를 관측함으로써 대략적인 위치를 추정하는 거야.

If the thing we are looking for is really within the city of Nagumo, then the wave of collapse energy radiation it releases will definitely affect the surrounding field...just by observing the change in the radiation field, we can locate the range of its location.
If what we're looking for is really in the Long Sky City, its disintegrating energy must be affecting its surroundings ...... by observing this change, we can determine its approximate location.

今、手元にある機材では探索範囲に限界があってね、方向が定まるまで、ある程度の時間が必要なの。
지금 손에 있는 장비로는 탐색 범위에 한계가 있어서 방향이 확정되기까지 어느 정도 시간이 필요해.
Now the material can be made to explore the limited range of instruments, so the initial positioning does take a longer time.
With the equipment I have at hand, I am limited in my search area, and I need some time to get oriented.

I need you to protect me when I try to find the direction, let me fully devote myself into it.
我需要你们在我探索方位的时候保护我，让我能全身体地投入到工作中就行。
だから、作業に集中できるよう、その間、私を守ってちょうだい。
그러니까 작업에 집중할 수 있게, 그 동안 날 지켜줘.
I need you guys to protect me while I explore my bearings and just allow me to be fully physically engaged.
So please protect me in the meantime so that I can concentrate on my work.

行！那简单~交给本大爷吧！
何だ！簡単じゃないか！任せろ！

Okay! That's easy, leave it to me!
Oh, my God! That was easy! I got it!

焦らないでちょうだい。科学研究の前半は退屈な作業が多いけど、成果が出た時には新しい扉が一気に開くから。
초조해하지 말아줘. 과학 연구의 전반부는 지루한 작업이 많지만, 성과가 나왔을 때는 새로운 문이 한 번에 열리니까.
Don't be anxious, scientific inquiry is often a boring and repetitive task up front...but when the results are obtained a new door will open.
Don't be in a hurry. The first half of scientific research is a lot of tedious work, but when you get results, new doors open all at once.

呃！得赶紧检测一下仪器有没有损坏！好不容易才制造出来的探测器要是坏掉的话就全完了！
あぁ、機材の点検しなきゃ！せっかく作った探知器が壊れたら大変だもの！
아, 기자재 점검해야 해! 애써 만든 탐지기가 고장 나면 큰일이라구!
Ugh! We need to check the instrument for damage! If the detector is broken, it's all over!
Oh, I have to check my equipment! I'd hate to see the detector I've built break!
诶诶诶！画面怎么全黑了…难道真的……
えぇええええッ！画面が真っ黒……そんな、まさか……。
에에에엑! 화면이 새까맣게…… 설마, 그럴 리가…….
Eh eh eh! How the screen is all black...is it really ......
Eeeeeeee! The screen is black ...... Oh, no way, .......
Hey! Seaweed head! Honkai creatures have been solved, why you look so sad! You should be happy!
喂！海藻头！崩坏生物已经全解决了，你怎么还哭丧着脸啊！给我高兴一下啊喂！
おい！崩壊生物は全部片付いたぞ！何だ、その顔は！喜べよな、ほらッ！
야! 붕괴 생물은 다 처리했어! 뭐야, 그 표정은! 기뻐해야지, 자!
Hey! Seaweed Head! Why are you still crying? Cheer up for me!
Hey! All the decaying organisms are gone! What's with your face? You should be happy. Come on!
You're happy…but my devices…done…everything is done……
你是高兴了…可我的仪器…完了…一切都完了……
喜べるわけないでしょ……機材が……終わったわ……何もかも……。
기뻐할 리가 없잖아…… 기자재가…… 끝났어…… 모든 게…….
You are happy...but my instrument...is finished...everything is finished ......
You can't be happy ...... equipment is finished ...... everything .......
See! It's working! Don't try to blame me for that!
完你个头啊！你这仪器不是好好的么！自己找不到还想要碰瓷给本大爷背锅么！
なーに、暗くなってんだよ！ちゃんと出来てんじゃんか！
뭐야, 어두워진 거 아냐! 제대로 되고 있잖아!
The end of your head ah! You are not a good instrument! They can not find it and want to porcelain to this master to take the blame!
What's going on? It's getting dark! You're doing fine!
Eh…the screen is working now…no, it's the explosion that discharged all the Honkai energy around, just like Herrscher's attack it becomes a vacuum, is that the reason……
呃…画面恢复了…不对，是刚才的爆炸冲击波把周围的崩坏能都排出了，就和律者的攻击一样形成了一个短暂的真空区，所以才显示不出么……
え？画面が戻った……いや、違う、さっきの爆破の衝撃が周囲の崩壊エネルギーを追い出したんだわ。つまり、律者の攻撃を受けた時と同じで、短い真空エリアが発生してるんだ。だから、一時的に画面が真っ黒になったのね……。
어? 화면이 돌아왔어... 아니, 다르네. 아까의 폭발 충격이 주변의 붕괴 에너지를 쫓아낸 거야. 즉, 율자의 공격을 받았을 때와 같은 짧은 진공 영역이 발생한 거지. 그래서 일시적으로 화면이 새까맣게 된 거네....
Uh ... the picture restored ... no, is just the explosion shock wave around the disintegration energy are discharged, and the Ruler's attack formed a short vacuum, so it does not show 么 ......

Huh? The screen came back ...... No, no, the impact of the earlier explosion drove the disintegrating energy out of the surrounding area. In other words, just like when you got hit by the law, there's a short vacuum area. That's why the screen went black temporarily. ......
Yes! Why didn't I think about this! This means a re-projection of the scene when Honkai energy resumes!
对啊！我怎么没想到这个方法！这样不就等于重新复现了崩坏能恢复的情景了么！
そう！この方法が正解だったのよ！あの場面を再現するのが、ベストな方法だったの！
그래! 이 방법이 정답이었어! 그 장면을 재현하는 게 최선의 방법이었던 거야!
Yes! Why didn't I think of that? This is the same as recreating the scenario where the collapse can be restored!
Yes!!! This was the right way! It was the best way to recreate that scene!
I have to admit it's all because of you Sin, we're lucky…at this moment, we might be able to find the point of difference of radiation wave.
不得不承认这次是杏你的功劳，也算是因祸得福了…趁着崩坏能重新汇聚，说不定就能检测到辐射波的差异点了。
今回は、シンのお陰だってことを認めるしかないわね。さて……崩壊エネルギーが再び集まったら、放射波のズレが検出できなくなるかもしれない、急がないと。
이번에는 신의 덕분이라는 걸 인정할 수밖에 없네. 자... 붕괴 에너지가 다시 모이면 방사파의 어긋남을 검출할 수 없게 될지도 몰라, 서둘러야 해.
Have to admit that this time is apricot you credit, but also considered a blessing in disguise ... while the collapse can re converge, maybe you can detect the point of difference in radiation waves.
I have to admit that this time it's thanks to Sin. Now ...... if the decay energy gathers again, we may not be able to detect the displacement of the radiation wave, we have to hurry.
Got it! Even it's weak, but it's reacting!
有了！虽然很微弱，但的确有反应了！
あった！かなり弱いけど、反応があったわ！
There it is! It's faint, but it's definitely responding!
There it is!!! Pretty weak, but I got a reaction!
Huh, finally…let's go! It's not far from here!
呼，终于找到了…走吧！距离这里不是很远！
やっと見つけることができた……行きましょう、ここからそう遠くないわ！
드디어 찾을 수 있었어... 가자, 여기서 그리 멀지 않아!
Whew, finally found it...let's go! Not very far from here!
I finally found it ...... let's go, it's not far from here!
The last second she's crying and now she's laughing…say I'm insane, I think you're losing your mind!
一会哭一会笑的…总是说我神经病，我看你自己才是脑子烧掉了！
泣いてんのかと思ったら、急に笑い出しやがって……いつもボクのこと頭おかしいって言うけど、お前も大概だな！
울고 있는 줄 알았더니 갑자기 웃어 버리고... 항상 날 미쳤다고 말하지만 너도 적당히 해!
Always crying and laughing...always saying I'm crazy, I think you're the one who's brain is burnt out!
I thought you were crying, but suddenly you started laughing. ...... You always call me crazy, but you're pretty much the same!
